Download TIGER shapes for states

Source: R/states.R
tt_states.Rd

Download TIGER shapes for states

Usage

tt_states(year = 2025)

Arguments

year

Integer year. Required. 2000 and 2010-2025 are currently supported.

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

# Wrapped in try due to false positive 304 errors
try(tt_states())
#> Simple feature collection with 56 features and 15 fields
